sect1.title: Acknowledgements
sect1.para: I would like to express my sincere thanks and immeasurable respect to:

listitem.para: Phillip Lougher - for his brilliant work under squashfs, for creating an exculsive patch for linux-2.4.18, for his help with polishing this howto and answers to my mails
Tabatha Marshall at TLDP for helping me with bringing this HOWTO to the final 1.0 release

sect1.para: I want to thank Artemiy for his patience answering my emails, allowing me to work to this howto. I would express also my thanks and respect to everybody who is involved in free software
